elements.text:
You and your family are heading out of town for a few days and your partner asks you to double-check that all the appliances in your house are turned off before you leave. You had to rush to pack so didn't get to check everything. 

Here are some behaviors that someone might do at that moment or in the future:

text: I want to cry thinking about how anxious I feel, but I know that this feeling won't last forever.
I focus on my conversation with my family.
I want to go back and check, but know that will make my anxiety worse in the future.
I go back to the house to make sure I turned everything off.
I start planning some activities we can do on our trip.
